question: Which of the following is true about Digital Detox App ? 1.It has been developed by Service for healthy use of technology (SHUT) clinics. 2.The app has been found to be effective in treating tuberculosis in patients. 3.The app will provide solution to the Tech-addicts at a click away.
explanation: The app has been developed by the Doctors at the National Institute of Mental Health and Neuro Sciences (NIMHANS), Bengaluru to help people reduce mobile usage. The app has been found to be effective in bringing about behavioral changes.
